title: vAri vAri
sahitya:
vAri vAri vazhangum vaLLalE varaiyAdu nal varangaLellAm


anupallavi

  mAri pOla Azhi pOla vasanta malarin maNam pOla 
manam kaninda kAdal Ola vara kaviyin vAkkup-pOla


caraNam    enrum engum eduvum unran irakka udavi uraikkap-pOmO   
nanri nanri enbadanri nararukkellAm amara jyOtiyE
